blocks.subject: Re: 12 December Trade
text: This confirmation should have the regular Omnibus Annex A attached as well as
the additional Chilean Annex which Tana forwarded last week.  Please call me

blocks.subject: 12 December Trade  Can you please help me to resolve this ASAP.  Thank you, Craig
raw_header: To: Derek Bailey/Corp/Enron@ENRON, Tana Jones/HOU/ECT@ECT, Mark
Can you please help me to resolve this ASAP.

blocks.subject: 12 December Trade
text: I received from Derek Bailey the Confirmation Form  and the Chilean Annex,
but I feel there is still missing the Annex A, as it is  refferred in the
Confirmation Form as part of the terms and conditions of the  transaction.
